TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SupportedJoinOperators extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies what types of Transact-SQL join statements are supported by the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks These members are flags that allow a bitwise combination of the join capabilities.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Common.SupportedJoinOperators FullOuter = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The data source supports full outer joins.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Common.SupportedJoinOperators Inner = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The data source supports inner joins.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Common.SupportedJoinOperators LeftOuter = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The data source supports left outer joins.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Common.SupportedJoinOperators None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The data source does not support join queries.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Common.SupportedJoinOperators RightOuter = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The data source supports right outer joins.
